title: C# ä½¿ç”¨ curl.exe å‘¼å«api
content:
æ¦‚è¿°

æœ‰æ™‚å€™é–‹ç™¼è»Ÿé«”çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬éèˆŠï¼Œå°è‡´ä»‹æ¥ API æœƒç•°å¸¸å›°é›£
å­¸é•·èªªå¯ä»¥ç”¨ curl ä¾†å‘¼å« apiï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å°±ä¾†çœ‹çœ‹æ€éº¼ç”¨

DownLoad curl.exe

https://curl.se/download.html#Win64

CurlHelper.cs

public class CurlHelper
    {
        // curl.exe è·¯å¾‘
        private static readonly string CurlPath = $"C:\\CURLDEMO\\EXE\\CURL.EXE";

        /// <summary>
        /// Get è«‹æ±‚
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="url"></param>
        /// <param name="headers"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        public static string GetRequest(string url, Dictionary<string, string> headers = null)
        {
            string arugments = $"-X GET \"{url}\"";
            if (headers != null)
            {
                foreach (var header in headers)
                {
                    arugments += $" -H \"{header.Key}: {header.Value}\"";
                }
            }
            return ExecuteCurlCommand(arugments);
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// POST è«‹æ±‚(JSONè³‡æ–™)
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="url"></param>
        /// <param name="jsonData"></param>
        /// <param name="headers"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        public static string PostRequest(string url, string jsonData, Dictionary<string, string> headers = null)
        {
            string arguments = $"-X POST -H \"Content-Type: application/json\" -d \"{jsonData}\" \"{url}\"";
            if (headers != null)
            {
                foreach (var header in headers)
                {
                    arguments += $" -H \"{header.Key}: {header.Value}\"";
                }
            }
            return ExecuteCurlCommand(arguments);
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// POST è«‹æ±‚(è¡¨å–®è³‡æ–™)
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="url"></param>
        /// <param name="formData"></param>
        /// <param name="headers"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        public static string PostFormRequest(string url, Dictionary<string, string> formData, Dictionary<string, string> headers = null)
        {
            string arguments = "-X POST";
            foreach (var item in formData)
            {
                arguments += $" -F \"{item.Key}={item.Value}\"";
            }
            arguments += $" \"{url}\"";
            if (headers != null)
            {
                foreach (var header in headers)
                {
                    arguments += $" -H \"{header.Key}: {header.Value}\"";
                }
            }
            return ExecuteCurlCommand(arguments);
        }


        /// <summary>
        /// åŸ·è¡Œcurlå‘½ä»¤è¿”å›è¼¸å‡º
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="arguments"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        private static string ExecuteCurlCommand(string arguments)
        {
            var startInfo = new ProcessStartInfo
            {
                FileName = CurlPath,
                Arguments = arguments,
                RedirectStandardOutput = true,
                UseShellExecute = false,
                CreateNoWindow = true,
            };
            using (var p = Process.Start(startInfo))
            {
                using (var reader = p.StandardOutput)
                {
                    return reader.ReadToEnd();
                }
            }
        }
    }

Usage

string url = "apiurl...";
var headers = new Dictionary<string, string>
{
      {"Authorization", "Bearer your_api_key"}
};
string response = CurlHelper.GetRequest(url, headers);
Console.WriteLine("Get Response: " + response);

title: Dijkstra æ¼”ç®—æ³•
content:
ğŸ§  ç°¡è¿°

ç”±è·è˜­è¨ˆç®—æ©Ÿç§‘å­¸å®¶ Edsger W. Dijkstra æ–¼ 1956 å¹´æå‡º

  • ç”¨ä¾†å°‹æ‰¾å–®ä¸€æºé»åˆ°å…¶ä»–ç¯€é»çš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾‘
  • é©ç”¨æ–¼åŠ æ¬Šåœ–(æ‰€ä»¥é‚Šçš„æ¬Šé‡ç‚ºæ­£)
  • å¸¸ç”¨çš„è³‡æ–™çµæ§‹ : å„ªå…ˆä½‡åˆ—(Priority Queue) æˆ– æœ€å°å †(Min-Heap)

ğŸ§­ æ­¥é©Ÿ

  1. å°‡æ‰€æœ‰ç¯€é»åˆ†ç‚ºå…©çµ„ï¼šå·²ç¢ºå®šæœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾‘ï¼ˆSï¼‰èˆ‡æœªç¢ºå®šï¼ˆUï¼‰
  2. åˆå§‹æ™‚ï¼Œèµ·é»åœ¨ Sï¼Œå…¶é¤˜åœ¨ Uï¼Œè·é›¢è¨­ç‚º âˆï¼Œèµ·é»è¨­ç‚º 0
  3. å¾ U ä¸­é¸æ“‡ç›®å‰èˆ‡èµ·é»è·é›¢æœ€çŸ­çš„ç¯€é»åŠ å…¥ S
  4. æ›´æ–°è©²ç¯€é»é„°æ¥é»çš„è·é›¢ï¼ˆé¬†å¼›ï¼‰
  5. é‡è¤‡æ­¥é©Ÿ 3~4ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰ç¯€é»éƒ½åŠ å…¥ S æˆ–ç„¡æ³•å†æ›´æ–°

ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» C# å¯¦ä½œï¼ˆå«ç¯„ä¾‹åœ–ï¼‰

ä»¥ä¸‹ç‚ºå°æ‡‰åœ–å½¢çš„ C# ç¨‹å¼å¯¦ä½œ

static void Main()
{
    int n = 7; // ç¯€é»æ•¸
    List<Edge>[] graph = new List<Edge>[n];
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) graph[i] = new List<Edge>();

    // å»ºç«‹åœ–çš„é„°æ¥è¡¨ï¼ˆæ ¹æ“šåœ–åƒï¼‰
    AddEdge(graph, 0, 1, 2);
    AddEdge(graph, 0, 2, 6);
    AddEdge(graph, 1, 3, 5);
    AddEdge(graph, 2, 3, 8);
    AddEdge(graph, 3, 4, 10);
    AddEdge(graph, 3, 5, 15);
    AddEdge(graph, 4, 5, 6);
    AddEdge(graph, 4, 6, 2);
    AddEdge(graph, 5, 6, 6);

    int start = 0;
    int[] dist = Dijkstra(graph, start);

    Console.WriteLine("èµ·é»åˆ°å„ç¯€é»çš„æœ€çŸ­è·é›¢");
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
        Console.WriteLine($"åˆ°ç¯€é»{i}çš„æœ€çŸ­è·é›¢ : {dist[i]}");
    }
}

class Edge
{
    public int To, Weight;
    public Edge(int to, int weight)
    {
        To = to; Weight = weight;
    }
}

static void AddEdge(List<Edge>[] graph, int from, int to, int weight)
{
    graph[from].Add(new Edge(to, weight));
    graph[to].Add(new Edge(from, weight)); // ç„¡å‘åœ–éœ€è¦é›™å‘é‚Š
}

static int[] Dijkstra(List<Edge>[] graph, int start)
{
    int n = graph.Length;
    int[] dist = new int[n];
    bool[] visited = new bool[n];

    // åˆå§‹åŒ–è·é›¢èˆ‡è¨ªå•ç‹€æ…‹
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dist[i] = int.MaxValue;
    dist[start] = 0;

    // ä½¿ç”¨NET6+ çš„ PriorityQueue<TElement, TPriority>
    // èˆŠç‰ˆè¦è‡ªå·±å¯¦ä½œ MinHeap
    // ä½¿ç”¨å„ªå…ˆä½‡åˆ—è™•ç†ç¯€é»ï¼Œä¾è·é›¢æœ€å°å„ªå…ˆè™•ç†
    var pq = new PriorityQueue<int, int>();
    pq.Enqueue(start, 0);

    while (pq.Count > 0)
    {
        int u = pq.Dequeue();

        // ç¢ºèªæ˜¯å¦è™•ç†éç¯€é»ï¼Œä¸¦æ›´æ–°è¨»è¨˜
        if (visited[u]) continue;
        visited[u] = true;

        // éæ­·æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸é„°é‚Š
        foreach (var edge in graph[u])
        {
            int v = edge.To;
            int weight = edge.Weight;

           // è‹¥å¾ u åˆ° v çš„æ–°è·é›¢æ›´çŸ­ï¼Œå‰‡æ›´æ–° dist ä¸¦æ”¾å…¥å„ªå…ˆä½‡åˆ—
            if (dist[u] + weight < dist[v])
            {
                dist[v] = dist[u] + weight;
                pq.Enqueue(v, dist[v]);
            }
        }
    }

    return dist;
}

content:
å‰è¨€

å› ç‚ºæ¥­å‹™éœ€æ±‚çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œéœ€è¦å°‡å¡«å¯«çš„è¡¨å–®è½‰æ›æˆ PDFï¼Œé€²è¡Œè³‡æ–™å„²å­˜ä¾›å¾ŒçºŒä½¿ç”¨

åˆ©ç”¨html2canvasé€²è¡Œæˆªåœ–ï¼Œç„¶å¾Œè²¼åˆ°jspdfç”¢ç”Ÿçš„ PDF æª”
ä½†æœ€ç©©å¦¥çš„æ–¹æ³•å»ºè­°æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨å¾Œç«¯æœå‹™å™¨å»å°ˆé–€ç”¢ç”Ÿ PDF æ¯”è¼ƒåˆé©(ex. wkhtmltopdf æˆ–æ˜¯ Puppeteer )

Install

npm install html2canvas jspdf

Usage

pdfHelper.ts

import jsPDF from "jspdf";
import html2canvas from "html2canvas";

export const generatePDF = async (id: string) => {
  try {
    // å–å¾—è¦æ“·å–çš„éƒ¨åˆ†
    const el = document.getElementById(id) as HTMLElement;
    if (!el) return "";

    // æˆªåœ–
    const canvas = await html2canvas(el, {
      useCORS: true, // å…è¨±è·¨åŸŸåœ–ç‰‡
      scale: 2, // æé«˜æ¸…æ™°åº¦
    });

    // è½‰æ›åœ–ç‰‡
    // toDataURL({è½‰æ›æ ¼å¼}, {å“è³ª})
    const imgData = canvas.toDataURL("image/jpeg", 0.7);

    // å‰µå»ºPDFæ–‡æª”
    const pdf = new jsPDF({
      orientation: "portrait", // é é¢æ–¹å‘
      unit: "pt", // å–®ä½
      format: "a4", // ç´™å¼µå¤§å°
    });

    // å–å¾—PDFå°ºå¯¸
    const pageWidth = pdf.internal.pageSize.getWidth();
    const pageHeight = pdf.internal.pageSize.getHeight();

    // èª¿æ•´ç‚ºA4å¯¬åº¦ä¸”ç¶­æŒåŸæœ¬å¯¬é«˜æ¯”
    const imgWidth = pageWidth;
    const imgHeight = (canvas.height * imgWidth) / canvas.width;

    // è‹¥åœ–åƒé«˜åº¦è¶…å‡ºé é¢é«˜åº¦ï¼Œå‰‡ç¸®å°
    const finalHeight = imgHeight > pageHeight ? pageHeight : imgHeight;
    const finalWidth = (canvas.width * finalHeight) / canvas.height;

    // å¯é¸ï¼šè®“åœ–ç‰‡ç½®ä¸­
    const marginX = (pageWidth - finalWidth) / 2;
    const marginY = (pageHeight - finalHeight) / 2;

    // æ·»åŠ åœ–ç‰‡åˆ°PDF
    pdf.addImage(
      imgData, // åœ–ç‰‡è³‡æ–™
      "JPEG", // åœ–ç‰‡æ ¼å¼
      marginX, // Xåº§æ¨™
      marginY, // Yåº§æ¨™
      finalWidth, //åœ–ç‰‡å¯¬åº¦
      finalHeight, //åœ–ç‰‡é«˜åº¦
      undefined, // åˆ¥å
      "FAST" // å£“ç¸®æ–¹æ³•
    );

    // å–å¾—åŒ…å« Base64 çš„ Data URL
    const pdfDataUrl = pdf.output("datauristring");

    // Data URL çš„æ ¼å¼é€šå¸¸æ˜¯ "data:application/pdf;base64,BASE64_STRING"
    // æˆ‘å€‘éœ€è¦æå–é€—è™Ÿå¾Œé¢çš„ Base64 éƒ¨åˆ†
    const base64String = pdfDataUrl.split(",")[1];

    return base64String;
  } catch (e) {
    console.log(e);
    throw e;
  }
};

public static void AddExtension(this IServiceCollection services)
{

    // services.AddScoped<CacheHelper>(); //å¦‚æœæœ‰ä½¿ç”¨æ•´åˆå·¥å…·é¡

Usage

[Route("api/[controller]")]
 [ApiController]
 public class DataController : ControllerBase
 {
     private readonly DataBaseService dataBaseService;
     private readonly IMemoryCache memoryCache;

     public DataController(DataBaseService dataBaseService, IMemoryCache memoryCache)
     {
         this.memoryCache = memoryCache;
         this.dataBaseService = dataBaseService;
     }

     [HttpGet("/search")]
     public async Task<IActionResult> Search(string keyword)
     {
        // å¾è¨˜æ†¶é«”å¿«å–æŸ¥çœ‹æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ²’å†å»è³‡æ–™åº«æ’ˆè³‡æ–™ä¸¦å„²å­˜å¿«å–
         if (memoryCache.TryGetValue("MainDataCache", out List<Prs006> dataList))
         {
             var result = dataList?
                 .Where(data => data.Ordnme?.Contains(keyword, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == true
                                || data.Scitn?.Contains(keyword, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == true
                                || data.Keyword?.Contains(keyword, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == true)
                 .ToList() ?? new List<Prs006>();

             return Ok(result);
         }
         else
         {
             var dbData = await dataBaseService.GetDatas();
             //å¯«å…¥è¨˜æ†¶é«”å„²å­˜ï¼Œä¸€å¤©å¾Œè‡ªå‹•éæœŸ
             memoryCache.Set("MainDataCache", dbData, TimeSpan.FromDays(1));

             var result = dbData?
                 .Where(data => data.Ordnme?.Contains(keyword, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == true

public class CacheHelper
{
    private readonly IMemoryCache cache;

    public CacheHelper(IMemoryCache cache)
    {
        this.cache = cache;
    }

    public void Set<T>(string key, T value, int expire = 300)
    {
        var options = new MemoryCacheEntryOptions
        {
            AbsoluteExpirationRelativeToNow = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(expire),
        };
        cache.Set(key, value, options);
    }

    public T? Get<T>(string key)
    {
        cache.TryGetValue<T>(key, out var value);
        return value;
    }

    public void Remove(string key)
    {
        cache.Remove(key);
    }

    public void Update<T>(string key, T value, int expire)
    {
        cache.Remove(key);
        Set<T>(key, value, expire);
    }

    public bool Contains(string key)
    {
        return cache.TryGetValue(key, out _);
    }
}

static void Main()
{
    // Data source.
    int[] scores = new int[] { 90, 71, 82, 93, 75, 82 };

    // Query Expression.
    IEnumerable<int> scoreQuery = //query variable
        from score in scores //required
        where score > 80 // optional
        orderby score descending // optional
        select score; //must end with select or group

    // Execute the query to produce the results
    foreach (var testScore in scoreQuery)

    // Output: 93 90 82 82
}

    // Data source.
    int[] scores = new int[] { 90, 71, 82, 93, 75, 82 };

    var scoreQuery = scores
        .Where(score => score > 80)

}

 public class SendTasJob : IJob
 {
     public async Task Execute(IJobExecutionContext context)
     {
         //Jobè¦å¯¦ä½œçš„å…§å®¹
          var tasid = context.MergedJobDataMap.GetString("tasid");
          var welcomeText = context.MergedJobDataMap.GetString("welcomeText");

Controller.cs

public class TasController : ControllerBase
{

    private readonly ISchedulerFactory schedulerFactory;
    private readonly IdGenerator idGenerator;

    public TasController(ISchedulerFactory schedulerFactory,
                         IdGenerator idGenerator)
    {
        this.schedulerFactory = schedulerFactory;
        this.idGenerator = idGenerator;
    }

    [HttpPost("[action]")]
    public async Task<IActionResult> ScheduleTasJob(TasJobRequest request)
    {
        // ä½¿ç”¨ SchedulerFactory å–å¾— Scheduler
        var sch = await schedulerFactory.GetScheduler();
       // é›ªèŠ±ç®—æ³•ç”¢Id
        var jobid = idGenerator.CreateId();
        var jobKey = new JobKey($"TasJob-{jobid}", "TasJobs");
        var triggerKey = new TriggerKey($"TasJobTrigger-{jobid}", "TasJobs");

        // å»ºç«‹Job
        var job = JobBuilder.Create<SendTasJob>()
            .WithIdentity(jobKey)
             //key value å¦‚æœæœ‰é–‹å•ŸUseProperties åªèƒ½æœ‰stringå‹åˆ¥
            .UsingJobData("tasid", request.TasId)
            .UsingJobData("welcomeText", request.WelcomeText)
            .StoreDurably() // ä½¿ä»»å‹™æŒä¹…åŒ–
            .Build();

        // è¨­å®šTrigger
        ITrigger trigger = TriggerBuilder.Create()
            .WithIdentity(triggerKey)
            .StartAt(request.ExecuteAt ?? DateTime.UtcNow) // æŒ‡å®šåŸ·è¡Œæ™‚é–“
            .WithSimpleSchedule(x => x
                .WithMisfireHandlingInstructionFireNow() // ç•¶æ’ç¨‹éŒ¯éåŸ·è¡Œæ™‚é–“æ™‚ç«‹å³åŸ·è¡Œ
                .WithRepeatCount(0) //åªåŸ·è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡
                )
            .Build();

        try
        {
           await sch.ScheduleJob(job, trigger);
           Console.WriteLine($"Scheduled job successfully with JobKey: {jobKey.Name} and TriggerKey: {triggerKey.Name}");
        }
        catch (Exception ex)
        {
            Console.WriteLine($"Failed to schedule job with JobKey: {jobKey.Name} and TriggerKey: {triggerKey.Name}", ex);
            return StatusCode(500, "Failed to schedule job");
        }

        return Ok($"Scheduled job successfully with Job: {jobKey.Name} and Trigger: {triggerKey.Name}");
    }
}

public class MessageHub : Hub
{
    // ç´€éŒ„ç”¨æˆ¶çš„é€£ç·š(å–®ä¸€ä½¿ç”¨è€…ç¾¤çµ„)
    public static readonly Dictionary<string, List<string>> _userConnections = new();

    // é€£ç·šæ™‚è¦åšçš„äº‹
    public override async Task OnConnectedAsync()
    {
        var userName = Context.GetHttpContext()?.Request.Query["user"]
          ?? throw new ArgumentNullException("æœªçŸ¥ä½¿ç”¨è€…");

        if (_userConnections.TryGetValue(userName,out var connectionIds))
        {
            if (!connectionIds.Contains(Context.ConnectionId))
            {
                connectionIds.Add(Context.ConnectionId);
            }
        }
        else
        {
            _userConnections.Add(userName, new List<string> { Context.ConnectionId });
        }

        await Groups.AddToGroupAsync(Context.ConnectionId, userName);
        await base.OnConnectedAsync();
    }

    // æ–·ç·šæ™‚è¦åšçš„äº‹
    public override async Task OnDisconnectedAsync(Exception? exception)
    {

        var user = _userConnections.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Value.Contains(Context.ConnectionId)).Key;

        if (user is not null)
        {
            // ç§»é™¤è©²ç”¨æˆ¶çš„é€£ç·š
            _userConnections[user].Remove(Context.ConnectionId);

            // å¦‚æœè©²ç”¨æˆ¶å·²ç¶“æ²’æœ‰ä»»ä½•é€£ç·š
            if (!_userConnections[user].Any())
            {
                // ç§»é™¤ç”¨æˆ¶
                _userConnections.Remove(user);
            }

            await Groups.RemoveFromGroupAsync(Context.ConnectionId, user);
        }

        await base.OnDisconnectedAsync(exception);
    }
}

<script setup lang="ts">
import * as signalR from '@microsoft/signalr';
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';

type MessageDto = {
  sender: string;
  content: string;
  timeSpan: Date;
};
const user = 'admin';
const receiveMsgs = ref<MessageDto[]>([]);

const connection = new signalR.HubConnectionBuilder()
  .withUrl(`https://localhost:7244/hub?user=${user}`)
  .withAutomaticReconnect()
  .build();

//ç›£è½å…¨é »æ¨æ’­
connection.on('ReceiveMessage', (res: MessageDto) => {
  receiveMsgs.value.push(res);
});

//ç›£è½ç¾¤çµ„æ¨æ’­
connection.on('ReceiveGroupMessage', (res: MessageDto) => {
  receiveMsgs.value.push(res);
});

//é‡æ–°é€£ç·š
connection.onreconnected(() => {
  console.log('Reconnected successfully.');
});

connection.onclose(async () => {
  console.log('Disconnected. Retrying connection...');
  await reconnect();
});

const reconnect = async () => {
  let attempts = 0;
  const maxAttempts = 100; // æœ€å¤§å˜—è©¦æ¬¡æ•¸
  const retryDelay = 30000; // å˜—è©¦é–“éš”(ms)

  while (attempts < maxAttempts) {
    try {
      await connection.start();
      console.log('Reconnected successfully.');
      return; // é€£ç·šæˆåŠŸ,é€€å‡ºå¾ªç’°
    } catch (err) {
      attempts++;
      console.log(`Reconnection attempt ${attempts} failed.`, err);
      if (attempts < maxAttempts) {
        await new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, retryDelay)); // ç­‰å¾…åé‡è¯•
      } else {
        console.log('Failed to reconnect after several attempts.')
      }
    }
  }
};

onMounted(async () => {
  try {
    await connection.start();
    console.log(`${user} has connected`)
  } catch (err) {
    console.log(err);
  }
});
</script>

var arr = [2, 5, 8, 6, 1];
var findThreeLargest = function (arr) {
  let curSum = 0;
  // åˆå§‹è¦–çª—ç¸½å’Œ(å‰3å€‹æ•¸ç¸½å’Œ)
  for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) {

  let maxSumIndex = 0; // æœ€å¤§ç¸½å’Œçš„èµ·å§‹ä½ç½®
  for (let i = 3; i < arr.length; i++) {

    // æ›´æ–°æœ€å¤§ç¸½å’Œçš„èµ·å§‹ä½ç½®
    if (curSum > maxSum) {
      maxSum = curSum;
      maxSumIndex = i - 3;
    }
  }
  return { maxSum, maxSumIndex };
};

public class QueryFactoryFactory : IQueryFactoryFactory
{
    private readonly IConfiguration _configuration;
    public QueryFactoryFactory(IConfiguration configuration)
    {
        _configuration = configuration;
    }
    public QueryFactory CreateQueryFactory(string dbKey)
    {
        var cs = _configuration.GetConnectionString(dbKey);
        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(cs))
        {
            throw new ArgumentException($"Connection string for {dbKey} is not found.");
        }
        var conn = new OracleConnection(cs);
        var compiler = new OracleCompiler();
        return new QueryFactory(conn, compiler);
    }
}

public interface IQueryFactoryFactory
{
    QueryFactory CreateQueryFactory(string dbKey);
}

int Constant(int n)
{

    // è¿´åœˆæ¬¡æ•¸èˆ‡ n ç„¡é—œ
    int size = 10000;

}
  • ç·šæ€§éš O(n)
int Linear(int n)
{
    int count = 0;
    // è¿´åœˆæ¬¡æ•¸ n æ¬¡
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
        count++;

  • å¹³æ–¹éš O(n2n^2n2)
int Quadratic(int n)
{
    int count = 0;
    // è¿´åœˆæ¬¡æ•¸ n*n æ¬¡
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
        {
            count++;
        }
    }
    return count;
}
  • æŒ‡æ•¸éš O(2n2^n2n)
int Exponential(int n)
{
    int count = 0;
    int bas = 1;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
        //è¿´åœˆæ¬¡æ•¸ç‚º2^næ¬¡
        for (int j = 0; j < bas; j++)
        {
            count++;
        }
        bas *= 2;
    }
    return count;
}
  • å°æ•¸éš O(logn)
int Logarithmic(int n)
{
    int count = 0;
    while (n > 1) {
        n /= 2;
        count++;
    }
    return count;
}
  • ç·šæ€§å°æ•¸éš O(nlogn)
int LinearLogRecur(int n)
{
    if (n <= 1) return 1;
    int count = LinearLogRecur(n / 2);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
        count++;
    }
    return count;
}
  • éšä¹˜éš O(n!)
int FactorialRecur(int n)
{
    if (n == 0) return 1;
    int count = 0;
    // n * (n - 1) * (n - 2) * ... * 2 * 1
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
        count += FactorialRecur(n - 1);
    }
    return count;
}

// ç¯€é»
public class TreeNode
{
    public int val;
    public TreeNode left;
    public TreeNode right;
    public TreeNode(int val = 0, TreeNode left = null, TreeNode right = null)
    {
        this.val = val;
        this.left = left;
        this.right = right;
    }
}

// æ·±åº¦å„ªå…ˆéæ­· (Depth-First Search, DFS)
// å‰åºéæ­·
public void PreorderTraversal(TreeNode root)
{
    if (root == null) return;
    Console.Write(root.val + " ") // è¨ªå•ç¯€é»
    PreorderTraversal(root.left); // éè¿´è¨ªå•å·¦å­æ¨¹
    PreorderTraversal(root.right); // éè¿´è¨ªå•å³å­æ¨¹
}

// ä¸­åºéæ­·
public void InorderTraversal(TreeNode root)
{
    if (root == null) return;
    InorderTraversal(root.left);    // éè¿´éæ­·å·¦å­æ¨¹
    Console.Write(root.val + " ");  // è¨ªå•ç¯€é»
    InorderTraversal(root.right);   // éè¿´éæ­·å³å­æ¨¹
}

// å¾Œåºéæ­·
public void PostorderTraversal(TreeNode root)
{
    if (root == null) return;
    PostorderTraversal(root.left);   // éè¿´éæ­·å·¦å­æ¨¹
    PostorderTraversal(root.right);  // éè¿´éæ­·å³å­æ¨¹
    Console.Write(root.val + " ");   // è¨ªå•ç¯€é»
}

// å»£åº¦å„ªå…ˆéæ­· (Breadth-First Search, BFS)
// éšå±¤éæ­·
public void LevelOrderTraversal(TreeNode root)
{
    if (root == null) return;

    Queue<TreeNode> queue = new Queue<TreeNode>();
    queue.Enqueue(root);

    while (queue.Count > 0)
    {
        TreeNode node = queue.Dequeue();
        Console.Write(node.val + " ");

        if (node.left != null) queue.Enqueue(node.left);
        if (node.right != null) queue.Enqueue(node.right);
    }
}
